<input type="button" value="Ver processo" id="nodeGoto" />
<script type="text/javascript">
    var url, value;
    $(document).ready(function(){
        console.log("inicio");
        value = FormUtil.getValue("p1_activity_id");
        console.log(value);
        url = "window.open('http://192.168.0.104:8080/jw/web/userview/workflowPL/UV_PL_Geral/_/inbox?_mode=assignment&activityId=" + value + "');";
        
        console.log(url);
        //url = "myFunc(" + url + ")";
    });
    
    function goToUrl(url){
        eval(url);
    }

    document.getElementById("nodeGoto").addEventListener("click", function() {
		console.log(url);
        goToUrl(url);
    }, false);
</script>
